name: Ninja Strike Free - finger tap games
name_original: Ninja Strike Free - finger tap games
description:
☆☆☆ Funny Ninjas ☆☆☆

Fight againts ninjas! Match three of more same kind of ninjas and strike, you got more points for bigger groups. This game is fun and addictive and mostly hilarious with a funny sounds and bouncing ninjas! This game will make you smile and kids will love it!

• game center support
• share results on facebook
• really funny
• Warning! Everybody who heard this game want to see it

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support@ccbrothers.com
